about_the_game:
The city cries out for heroes. Can you answer the call?

Eight Dragons 2 is a pulse-pounding beat-'em-up that injects the classic arcade brawls of the eighties with a shot of modern mayhem. Explore 4 districts with up to 7 friends (local or online co-op!) and crack skulls together as you liberate your city from the iron grip of gang rule.

Choose your Dragon

  • 8 PLAYABLE CHARACTERS, each with their own unique fighting style and SPECIAL MOVES to master.

  • Level up your character and unleash devastating combos to send enemies flying.

Justice Never Sleeps

  • The story unfolds as you track down and dismantle rival gangs, one brutal boss fight at a time.

  • Explore 4 UNIQUE ENVIRONMENTS, each teeming with thugs, punks, and criminal masterminds waiting for a beatdown.

  • Pick up an arsenal of WEAPONS to rain down pain, or keep it old-school with your bare fists.

Unite or Fight Alone

  • Team up LOCALLY or ONLINE with up to 7 friends and unleash cooperative mayhem on the streets.

  • Coordinate devastating combos and strategize takedowns to become an unstoppable force for justice.

Eight Dragons 2: Fight alone. Fight together. Just remember... someone will pay.

short_description: Eight Dragons 2 is a retro-inspired beat 'em up that brings back the classic arcade action. Join forces with up to 7 friends in co-op mode, unleash powerful combos, and battle through streets filled with thugs and bosses. Fight your way to justice in this explosive sequel!
